duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide family medicine services and care for patients of all ages in a clinic setting.
Manage patient appointments, records, and medical history using EMR system (EClinical Works).
Ensure compliance with state regulations and maintain active MI License and DEA certification.
Work Monday through Friday from 8am to 5pm with a maximum case load of 20-25 patients per day.
Collaborate with healthcare team to deliver high-quality, comprehensive care to patients.

education_certification.credential: MD or DO degree with active MI License and DEA certification
